description: Designed to introduce students to the interdisciplinary field of Latin American and Latino Studies, this is a seminar oriented toward first and second year students. Readings will range widely, from scholarly work on the colonial world that followed from and pushed back against the "conquest"; to literary and artistic explorations of Latin American identities; to social scientists' explorations of how Latinos are changing the United States in the current generation.
name: INTRO LAT AM & LATINO ST: Intro to Latin American and Latino Studies

section.name: INTRO LAT AM & LATINO ST: Intro to Latin American and Latino Studies
